tripleplay.platform

Interface VirtualKeyboardController


  • public interface VirtualKeyboardController

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hideKeyboardForTouch(pythagoras.f.Point location)
      Return true if the keyboard should be hidden for a touch that starts at the given location.
      boolean hideKeyboardOnEnter()
      Called each time a field has the return key pressed.

    • Method Detail

      • hideKeyboardForTouch

        boolean hideKeyboardForTouch(pythagoras.f.Point location)
        Return true if the keyboard should be hidden for a touch that starts at the given location. The default (with no VirtualKeyboardController specified) is to hide the virtual keyboard for any touch that does not start on a native text field. With this method, fine control is possible, allowing some in-game UI to be interacted with without hiding the virtual keyboard if desired.

      • hideKeyboardOnEnter

        boolean hideKeyboardOnEnter()
        Called each time a field has the return key pressed. Return true to hide the keyboard (the default).
